# frame

**Instance Property**

The frame of the scrubber item.

## Declaration

```swift
var frame: NSRect { get set }
```

## Controlling the layout

- **alpha**: The item’s alpha value.
- **itemIndex**: The index of the scrubber item that is represented by the item’s layout attributes.

items.description: The index of the scrubber item that is represented by the item’s layout attributes.
